CustomField.formula: (IF( ISPICKVAL( Ownership_Call__c , "Pass") || ISPICKVAL( Ownership_Call__c , "N/A") , 1, 0 ) + IF( ISPICKVAL( Proper_Understanding_of_Issue__c , "Pass") || ISPICKVAL( Proper_Understanding_of_Issue__c , "N/A") , 1, 0) + IF( ISPICKVAL( Provide_Correct_Information__c , "Pass") || ISPICKVAL( Provide_Correct_Information__c , "N/A") , 1, 0)) / 3
CustomField.label: Structure Total % (Phone)
